languages.text: "Кто одумался — да будет помилован. Хвалю за инициативность".
"Those who have reconsidered their ways should be pardoned. Your initiative is commendable."
languages.original_text: "Кто одумался — да будет помилован. Хвалю за инициативность".

traits.locale_text: "Those who have reconsidered their ways should be pardoned. Your initiative is commendable."
"Those who have reconsidered their ways should be pardoned. Your initiative is commendable."
"Those who have reconsidered their ways should be pardoned. Your initiative is commendable."
"Those who have reconsidered their ways should be pardoned. Your initiative is commendable."
"Those who have reconsidered their ways should be pardoned. Your initiative is commendable."
"Those who have reconsidered their ways should be pardoned. Your initiative is commendable."

languages.text: “所有悔过自新的人都应该得到宽恕，你的勇气值得称赞。”
languages.original_text: "Those who have reconsidered their ways should be pardoned. Your initiative is commendable."

traits.locale_text: “所有悔过自新的人都应该得到宽恕，你的勇气值得称赞。”

languages.text: 「考え直した奴らは許されるべきだ。お前の取り組みは称賛に値する」
languages.original_text: "Those who have reconsidered their ways should be pardoned. Your initiative is commendable."

traits.locale_text: 「考え直した奴らは許されるべきだ。お前の取り組みは称賛に値する」

languages.text: «Hay que perdonar a los que han recapacitado. Su iniciativa es de admirar».
languages.original_text: "Those who have reconsidered their ways should be pardoned. Your initiative is commendable."

traits.locale_text: «Hay que perdonar a los que han recapacitado. Su iniciativa es de admirar».

languages.text: "Wer geläutert wurde, der sollte begnadigt werden. Eure Initiative ist bewundernswert."
languages.original_text: "Those who have reconsidered their ways should be pardoned. Your initiative is commendable."

traits.locale_text: "Wer geläutert wurde, der sollte begnadigt werden. Eure Initiative ist bewundernswert."

languages.text: « Ceux qui se sont remis sur le droit chemin peuvent être pardonnés. Votre initiative est louable. »
languages.original_text: "Those who have reconsidered their ways should be pardoned. Your initiative is commendable."

traits.locale_text: « Ceux qui se sont remis sur le droit chemin peuvent être pardonnés. Votre initiative est louable. »

languages.text: "Pişman olup tövbe edenler bağışlanmalıdır. Bu girişkenliğin takdire şayan."
languages.original_text: "Those who have reconsidered their ways should be pardoned. Your initiative is commendable."
